description: Alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension and installation of three roof lights to front roof slope.
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawings titled:

Application form; Proposed ground floor plan (Revision number: 01); Existing & Proposed ground floor plan (Revision number: 01); Existing and proposed front, rear and side elevations (Revision number: 01); Site Plan (Title number: AGL87501) (Reference Number: TQ1579NE); Proposed front, rear and side elevations (Revision number: 01);

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), polices D1, and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019).

| Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any subsequent amendment, revision or new Order) no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted.

Reason:  To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019).
| The proposed rooflights hereby approved shall not project more than 150mm from the roof plane and retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4 an 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013).

| The proposed high-level windows in the side elevation shall contain only obscure glass and shall be non-opening to a height of 1.7 metres from adjacent floor level and shall be retained permanently.
Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties, in accordance with policies, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the adopted development management Plan DPD (2013).
